item.title: Finished the Ruby Koans
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: I finished the Ruby Koans today. It is a set of test cases designed to help you learn Ruby by making all the tests pass.

item.title: Learning Ruby

item.description: Learning Ruby via testing. Trying to also learn the Rails server enivronment as well.
